snippet: Facing an even bigger mountain of packages this holiday season, FedEx and UPS are hiring more workers to avoid the delays that frustrated shoppers and gift-recipients a year ago....

headline.print_headline: FedEx, UPS Make Plans for a Better Holiday Season
headline.main: FedEx, UPS Make Plans for a Better Holiday Season

lead_paragraph: Facing an even bigger mountain of packages this holiday season, FedEx and UPS are hiring more workers to avoid the delays that frustrated shoppers and gift-recipients a year ago.
